ComicInfo.Summary:
After team Vampblade’s first mission goes sideways, Katie finds herself a stranger in an even stranger land -- Blade World! Does this bizarre alien landscape and its inhabitants hold the key to her new dynamic with the blades?!
Features 3 covers (regular, artist, and 90s style), each with a risqué variant as well!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Regular Cover | Winston Young | 1 | B | Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Winston Young | 2 | C | Artist Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Dan Mendoza | 3 | D | Artist Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Dan Mendoza | 4 | E | 90's Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Marco Maccagni | 5 | F | Risqué 90's Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Marco Maccagni | 6 | Note: Overall issue #18.
